title: Market Data Portfolio
description: Built a production-grade stock portfolio web application with real-time market data, dynamic holdings tracking, and transaction journaling. Implemented a balance calculator, customizable data grids with sorting and filtering, and automated refresh to keep views current. Delivered a responsive Angular UI with sticky headers, modal workflows, and mobile-first layouts.

title: Buff Discord Music Bot
description: Developed a feature-rich Discord music bot with queue management, loop modes, and granular playback controls. Integrated YouTube and Spotify sources with FFmpeg-based streaming to enable stable, low-latency playback. Containerized with Docker for reproducible deployments and simplified operations.

title: Microsoft Rewards Automation
description: Authored a Python automation utility to complete daily Microsoft Rewards tasks using Selenium-driven browser flows. Added configurable delays, error handling, and structured logging to improve reliability and repeatability. Reduced manual effort while ensuring consistent task completion.

title: RP Server Development
description: Architected and developed a GTA V roleplay server on RAGE Multiplayer featuring jobs, housing, vehicles, and economy systems. Emphasized scalable server logic, persistent data models, and engaging gameplay loops. Implemented modular features to simplify ongoing updates and community-driven expansions.

title: Calendar Event Manager
description: Built a desktop application to create, update, and manage Google Calendar events with secure account integration. Designed an intuitive interface with clear event forms, date pickers, and actionable status feedback. Streamlined routine scheduling to reduce friction and user error.

title: WEB-based Multiplayer Game
description: Developed a real-time multiplayer browser game during an HCL internship using modern web technologies and networking concepts. Implemented server–client messaging, session handling, and responsive inputs to maintain smooth gameplay. Focused on lightweight assets and efficient update loops for consistent performance.

title: Multiplayer Turtle Game
description: Created a local multiplayer game using Python’s Turtle graphics to enable multiple players on a single system. Implemented collision detection, turn logic, and scorekeeping to provide a complete gameplay loop. Structured the codebase for readability and easy experimentation.

title: Medicine Reminder
description: Developed a Windows desktop application to manage medication schedules with configurable reminders. Added medicine catalogs, scheduling workflows, and system notifications to support timely adherence. Focused on a clean, accessible UI to minimize user friction.
